import {useState} from 'react' import { Button, Toast, Card, Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './FunFacts.css' import xiatian1 from '../img/xiatian1.jpeg' import xiatian2 from '../img/xiatian2.JPG' import xiatian3 from '../img/xiatian3.JPG' import xiatian4 from '../img/xiatian4.jpeg' function FunFact(){ const [show, setShow] = useState(true); const toggleShow = () => setShow(!show); return (
I have a cat
when she was about 8-month old Her name is Xiatian when she was about 8-month old when she was about 8-month old when she was about 8-month old
her name is Xiatian(summer) 16 months ago I met her beside a trash bin ...
) } export default FunFact
